summary:
This mod reskins the statues of Skyrim to look as if they're painted.

Since the early days of carving and building icons to gods people have painted them. I'm trying to reflect this with the level of detail/upkeep of the paint on the statue.
descriptionHtml:
This mod reskins the statues of Skyrim to look as if they're painted.

Since the early days of carving and building icons to gods people have painted them. I'm trying to reflect this with the level of detail/upkeep of the paint on the statue.
author: Deputy Dropshot
